text: Au gaa huli godou hagamiami haga tenetene gi nia tangitangi o di mmade, gaa huli hogi godou daahili tenetene gi nia dangi manawa gee. Au ga haga ulu goodou gi nia goloo o di manawa gee, gaa dahi gi daha nia ngaahulu o godou libogo. Goodou gaa hai gadoo be tamana mo tinana ala e tangitangi gi di nau dama hua e dahi dela guu made. Di laangi deelaa la gaa hai di laangi koia e haga manawa gee huoloo, gaa dae loo gi dono hagaodi.
